Set tool by using the assembly table
Lithography rules which you want on the lithography table
death.attack.origin_thaumaturgy: %1$s was disintegrated by an electromagnetic strike
patchouli.gui.et_text: Welcome to Electromagical Thaumaturgy. This mod has no mana; it uses FE to manipulate electromagnetism to form spells
patchouli.et_books.start_page: The Electromagnetic Rod is the medium for casting spells and also a configurator for certain machines.  When held, press the Spell Switch key (default: V) to cycle between spells.
patchouli.et.rod_use: The Electromagnetic Assembly Table configures the rod. Configuration slots include an Oscillator, Amplifier, and 8 spell slots. The Oscillator determines base spell damage, the Amplifier sets the damage multiplier. If oscillator is empty, spells deal no damage. Both have Iron, Gold, Copper, and Superconductor tiers.
patchouli.et.harmonic_core_block.descrip: Using two emerald blocks and one Harmonic Core, arrange them in the manner of summoning a snow golem, and it will awaken █████████. WARNING: Signal lost #07x4A - Datastream corrupted by unknown harmonic interference - Failed to download full protocol.
patchouli.et.battery.show: Basic disposable battery providing 16,384 FE. Hold in main hand with chargeable item in offhand, then use the item to charge.
patchouli.et.battery.power_bank: Power Bank stores 65,536 FE. Usage is identical to the disposable battery, but it's reusable.
patchouli.et.generator_entries.thermal_g: Simply throw in fuel - straightforward and efficient.
patchouli.et.generator_entries.temperatu: Place a hot block and a cold block on the top and bottom faces (order interchangeable). Example: Water above with Campfire below, or Campfire above with Water below.
patchouli.et.generator_entries.photovolt: Generates power from light. Output varies with light level. Stable output with a torch nearby.
patchouli.et.generator_entries.biomass_g: Draws energy from foods and converts it into FE.
patchouli.et.generator_entries.energy_bl: Stores energy. All six faces can input/output energy. Right-click to open GUI for charging/discharging items.
patchouli.et.generator_entries.energy_tr: Wireless energy transfer. Top: red=output, green=input (change by right-clicking empty-handed). Bind input/output by right-clicking each with the rod.
patchouli.et.magic_entries.start: Spell Etching Platform crafts spells. Requires one tier of baseboard. Open GUI to craft instantly - no waiting.
patchouli.et.enhance_entries.start: Enhancement Modulator adjusts rod upgrades and spell enhancements.
patchouli.et.baseboard: Base component for crafting enhancement boards
patchouli.et.entropy_enhance: Targets catch fire from entropy buildup upon hit
patchouli.et.life_extraction_enhance: Direct hits restore health based on damage dealt
patchouli.et.attract_module.description: Creates a magnetic beacon that attracts entities in range
patchouli.et.pulsed_plasma_module.descri: Emits a plasma pulse that ricochets off blocks
patchouli.et.protecting_module.descripti: Applies a magnetic shield to self
patchouli.et.exciting_module.description: Energizes entities in range, causing glow and damage
patchouli.et.electric_field_domain_modul: Emits a high-intensity field damaging moving entities
patchouli.et.tree_current_module.descrip: Strikes nearest target, chaining to closest entities
patchouli.et.magnetic_recombination_cann: Deploys beacon for delayed AoE blast
patchouli.et.electromagnetic_assault_mod: Teleports forward a short distance and grants temporary flight ability.
patchouli.et.magma_lighting_module.descr: Turns blocks into lava after delay + lightning strikes
patchouli.et.st_elmo_s_fire_module.descr: Summons protective St. Elmo's Fire around self
patchouli.et.hydrogen_bond_fracture_modu: Shatters target's hydrogen bonds for lethal damage
patchouli.et.magnet_resonance_module.des: Links entities - damage to one affects all
patchouli.et.block_nerve_module.descript: Impairs neural signals, causing slowness and weakness
patchouli.et.mirage_pursuit_module.descr: Creates mirage that attacks targets after your spell hits
patchouli.et.magnetic_flux_cascade_modul: Locks onto a target, then triggers 4 additional chain jumps to nearby enemies via magnetic flux
patchouli.et.frequency_division_arrow_ra: Emits electromagnetic waves over a targeted area, modulating amplitude into arrows that strike enemies
patchouli.et.saint_summon_module.descrip: Isolate and purify the primordial harmonic imprint—untouched by corrosive energy—from a cleansed Harmonic Sovereign's core. Activation does not summon a new entity, but rather guides forth its pure aspect: the Harmonic Saint, to aid you as an ally.
patchouli.et.generator_entries.electroma: The Electromagnetic Driver auto-targets and casts spells from inserted modules at increased energy cost. Note: Cannot cast self-enhancement type spells.
patchouli.et.generator_entries.bio_repli: Generate biological entities recorded in the Genetic Sequencer placed within.
patchouli.et.generator_entries.genetic_r: Record biological data from living entities when used on them, enabling cloning processes.
patchouli.et.generator_entries.electroma: Emits electromagnetic waves from its emission face. Mines blocks centered on the irradiated area with configurable width and depth settings.
patchouli.et.generator_entries.nitrogen_: Accelerate the growth of crops in an 8-block radius centered on itself, and automatically harvests them. Harvests yield double the normal drops.
